# Import Data
```{r}
NL_data = read.csv("data_month_NL.csv")
GDP_data = read_dta("Region by year GDP panel.dta")
view(NL_data)
view(GDP_data)
```

# New dataset
```{r}
all_data = left_join(NL_data, GDP_data, by = c("year"="year", "reg"="reg"))
all_data=all_data %>% 
  mutate(NLI=nl_sum_4/(area_sq_km - 0.141*nl_nodata_4),NLI2 = nl_mean_4/nl_std_4)
```
